column2: the service was very good. Our food was interesting. I had the Spiced Apple Pancakes. They were good
column3: but there was a flavor in them that I was not expecting
column4: more of a spicy flavor than a sweet flavor. It wasn't bad
column5: just unexpected. The garlic potatoes as a side
column7: were fabulous and melt in your mouth good. I'm not sure I'd go back for breakfast
column8: but I would be interested in trying their lunch menu. I think the flavors might be better for lunch than breakfast.
